about_the_game: Only the greatest Space Marines and vilest Chaos Space Marines are given the chance to become the heavily armored 20 foot tall Dreadnought.  Fight to control the ancient machinery necessary in multiplayer to encase one member of your team inside the walking destructive force that is the Dreadnought.  Strike down the Imperium or defend the Emperor on three new multiplayer maps.
detailed_description: Only the greatest Space Marines and vilest Chaos Space Marines are given the chance to become the heavily armored 20 foot tall Dreadnought.  Fight to control the ancient machinery necessary in multiplayer to encase one member of your team inside the walking destructive force that is the Dreadnought.  Strike down the Imperium or defend the Emperor on three new multiplayer maps.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Dreadnought DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual core CPU (any Core 2 Duo or AMD X2 or better)
  • Memory: 1GB (XP), 2GB (Vista), 2GB (Windows 7)
  • Graphics: 256MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 8800GT, AMD Radeon 3850 and above)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 20 GB space free (10 GB free after install)
  • Sound:
    Laptop and Notebook users will need to download the newest Nvidia 280.26 or AMD Catalyst 11.8 drivers.
pc_requirements.recommended:
• OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Quad-core Intel or AMD Processor
  • Memory: 1GB (XP), 2GB (Vista), 2GB (Windows 7)
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Performance equivalent to an AMD Radeon 5750 or better)
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 20 GB space free (10 GB free after install)
  • Sound:
    Laptop and Notebook users will need to download the newest Nvidia 280.26 or AMD Catalyst 11.8 drivers.

short_description: Only the greatest Space Marines and vilest Chaos Space Marines are given the chance to become the heavily armored 20 foot tall Dreadnought. Fight to control the ancient machinery necessary in multiplayer to encase one member of your team inside the walking destructive force that is the Dreadnought.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish - Spain
